argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pwsbas.y | |- Y = ( R ^s I ) |
| 2 |  | pwsbas.f | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | pwselbas.v | |- V = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 4 |  | pwselbas.r | |- ( ph -> R e. W ) |
| 5 |  | pwselbas.i | |- ( ph -> I e. Z ) |
| 6 |  | pwselbas.x | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_pwselbasb | |- ( ( R e. W /\ I e. Z ) -> ( X e. V <-> X : I --> B ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 5, 7 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( X e. V <-> X : I --> B ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> X : I --> B ) |
